metadata.title: CVE-2019-12819 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.0. The function__mdiobus_register() in drivers/net/phy/mdio_bus.c calls put_device(),which will trigger a fixed_mdio_bus_init use-after-free. This will cause adenial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
